meanings.definition: To label again with a different name or description.
meanings.sent1: After the mistake, they had to relabeling the boxes with the correct information.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to relabeling the products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The chef's relabeling of the dish as 'gourmet surprise' made everyone curious.
meanings.sent4: She felt like relabeling her emotions to better understand them.
meanings.sent5: The artist was relabeling the colors in her palette to create a new masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the label on something.
meanings.sent1: The relabeling of the products caused confusion among the shoppers.
meanings.sent2: The relabeling of the boxes was necessary to update the information.
meanings.sent3: The relabeling of the jars made them look brand new on the shelves.
meanings.sent4: The relabeling of the map led to unexpected discoveries for the explorers.
meanings.sent5: The relabeling of the files made the office organization much easier.
